description:
Step into Cozy Woods, a serene walking simulator where exploration and relaxation go hand in hand. Wander through lush forests, hidden groves, and scenic overlooks as you take in the beauty of a world that shifts between day and night.

Explore & Discover
Roam freely across stunning landscapes filled with charming details and hidden secrets.
Uncover unique locations, from misty lakesides to glowing firefly meadows.
Experience a world that changes with the time of day, revealing new sights under the golden sun or twinkling stars.
